entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
